# CliniCore!

<img width="849" height="260" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d4f7763f-08f9-4dea-848e-476ca41eae95" />


This project is aimed at creating a fluid and dynamic EHR system for our client's medical practice.

## Features

- [x] Allows easy management of medical supplies and stocks
- [x] Fast and secure logins for both patients and staff to access and store confidential medical information
- [x] Tailor made for the client's specifcitaions and busisness needs

## Installation

```sh
(ADD  COMMMAND TO RUN BACKEND HERE)
cd .\Frontend
npm run dev
```
You may need to install NPM via 
```ssh
npm install 
```
